VLAN_INTERFACE_IPPREFIX_MUST_CONDITION_F.desc: Vlan Interface Ip-prefix must condition failure.

INCORRECT_VLAN_NAME.desc: INCORRECT VLAN_NAME FIELD IN VLAN TABLE.

WRONG_FAMILY_WITH_IP_PREFIX.desc: Configure Wrong family with ip-prefix for VLAN_Interface Table

DHCP_SERVER_INCORRECT_FORMAT.desc: Add dhcp_server which is not in correct ip-prefix format.

DHCPV6_SERVER_INCORRECT_FORMAT.desc: Add dhcpv6_server which is not in correct ipv6-address format.

VLAN_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORT.desc: Configure a member port in VLAN_MEMBER table which does not exist.

VLAN_WITH_PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER.desc: Configure a PortChannel as a member of Vlan.

VLAN_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER.desc: Configure a non existent PortChannel as a member of Vlan.

VLAN_MEMEBER_WITH_NON_EXIST_VLAN.desc: Configure vlan-id in VLAN_MEMBER table which does not exist in VLAN  table.

VLAN_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure wrong value for nat zone.
VLAN_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.eStr: Invalid nat zone for the vlan interface.

VLAN_INTERFACE_VALID_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure valid value for nat zone.
